exm.mng: to delay, to hold up, to waste time, to interfere with
to tarry, to delay, to stop over
to indulge in, to wallow in
variant of 擔心|担心[dan1 xin1]
to fret over the worries of long-departed people (idiom); to worry unnecessarily, crying over spilt milk, often used with negatives, e.g. no need to worry about past issues
variant of 擔憂|担忧[dan1 you1]
